entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
